title: Statement on 2018 US Living Wills Results
body:
We are pleased that the Federal Reserve and FDIC found our 2018 US resolution plan to be free of deficiencies and will address the feedback we received from the agencies. This result demonstrates our progress simplifying and enhancing the resolvability of our US operations. We will continue to dedicate significant resources across the firm to further ensure that our US operations can be resolved without posing systemic risk to the financial system.
About Deutsche Bank
Deutsche Bank provides commercial and investment banking, retail banking, transaction banking and asset and wealth management products and services to corporations, governments, institutional investors, small and medium-sized businesses, and private individuals. Deutsche Bank is Germany’s leading bank, with a strong position in Europe and a significant presence in the Americas and Asia Pacific.
